item.title: Tomahawks take center stage in Trump's Russia-Ukraine diplomacy
item.description: Zelenskyy said discussions military assets from the U.S. -- including Tomahawk missiles -- motivated Putin to meet with Trump in Budapest.

item.title: Survivors reported for 1st time in latest US Caribbean airstrike: Official
item.description: In previous, similar strikes, the U.S. has claimed that there have been no survivors.
